text: Americominella perminuta is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== ==Distribution== Americominella perminuta are found in the North Atlantic Ocean and were first found off the coast of Georgia in the southern United States. ==References== Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1927
title: Americominella perminuta
